en: Andrew Jergens Co. Cincinnati--New York. Text: "Doris Toilet Water is put up in beautiful ornamental opaque glass containers, which are refillable. It is a perfect powder (imported) of the finest texture, prepared with boric acid and other ingredients, making it appropriate for face and general usage. It is made in Rose and Violet odors and Flesh and White tints."

Duke has not determined the copyright status of this item.
